version.prefix: DECLARE @is_policy_automation_enabled bit SET @is_policy_automation_enabled = (SELECT CONVERT(bit, current_value) FROM msdb.dbo.syspolicy_configuration WHERE name = 'Enabled')

link_multiple.expression: case when 1=@is_policy_automation_enabled and exists (select * from msdb.dbo.syspolicy_system_health_state where target_query_expression_with_id like {0}+ '/{2}\[@Name=' + QUOTENAME({1},'''') + '\]%' ESCAPE '\') then 1 else 0 end
